scripts.tests: bun run lint && npm run tests:snowflake && npm run tests:symbolic
scripts.tests:snowflake: npm run ./tests/Snowflake/default.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Snowflake/difference.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Snowflake/epoch.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Snowflake/place_id.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Snowflake/sequence.test.ts
scripts.tests:symbolic: npm run ./tests/Symbolic/default.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Symbolic/difference.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Symbolic/epoch.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Symbolic/place_id.test.ts && npm run ./tests/Symbolic/sequence.test.ts
